sentences.sentence: This government believes very strongly in the empowerment of women.
sentences.translation: 这届政府坚信赋权于妇女。

sentences.sentence: Empowerment takes the idea of delegation much further than has traditionally been the case.
sentences.translation: 授权比传统的情况更进一步地采用委托的概念。

sentences.sentence: This empowerment has been part of the trend towards downsizing: reducing the number of management layers in companies.
sentences.translation: 这种授权已经成为了缩小规模趋势的一部分，也就是要减少公司的管理层级数量。
